resources.string: • The streets are littered with dead people, something disasterous happened here
• An abandoned lab with no sign of a struggle, whatever happened here it wasnt initially violent
• Whatever those men in red are they appear to be hungry, so hungry that they want to eat you alive ... seriously when does something like that that get fun?!?
• A computer password, all you need now is somewhere to use it
• Someone is going around destroying all the equipment, including the computers, just as you get a password for them. Perhaps its those men in red
â€¢ All the equipment in this lab is destroyed, whater happened here was fast and violent, maybe a hostile takeover by the military ... Somehow this information doesnt seem right.
• Men in the distance walking in formation, that doesnt seem like something the men in red would do. The glint of purple on their clothing seems important
